title: Four
Content:
you have one life, make it count.
wasted time spent not indulging in greatness
instead indulging in momentary pleasures

momentary pleasures mean nothing.
ABSOLUTELY NOTHING
yuck.

There is nothing in this world for me.

I am here, slowly chipping away till I am at skills edge, 
this is the only thing that excites me.


the POLYMATH will kill the SLAVE MASTER, and the slave eventually kills the king.
